    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    Facet PaymentCard_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:PaymentCard_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<PaymentCard effectiveDate="0116" expireDate="0117" id="paymentCard_1" secureInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <CardCode>AX</CardCode>
    <CardType issuerCode="VISA" issuerCodeExtension="issuerCode_Other_Value">786</CardType>
    <Issuer description="Visa" id="codeExternal_1" name="Example String Value" uRL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">Example String Value</Issuer>
    <CardHolderName>Example String Value</CardHolderName>
    <CardNumber authenticationMethod="SecurityCode" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
        <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
        <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Complete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Advisory" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
    </CardNumber>
    <AuthenticationVerification authenticationMethod="MagneticStripe" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
        <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
        <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Incomplete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Application error" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
    </AuthenticationVerification>
    <MagneticStripe authenticationMethod="SecurityCode" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
        <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
        <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Not processed" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Authentication" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
    </MagneticStripe>
    <SeriesCode authenticationMethod="MagneticStripe" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
        <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
        <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Unknown" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Authentication timeout" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
    </SeriesCode>
</PaymentCard>

      Example JSON

      {
  "PaymentCardSummary" : {
    "id" : "paymentCard_1",
    "effectiveDate" : "0116",
    "expireDate" : "0117",
    "secureInd" : true,
    "Privacy" : {
      "value" : null,
      "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
      "shareSyncInd" : "No",
      "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
      "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
    },
    "CardCode" : "AX",
    "CardType" : {
      "value" : "786",
      "issuerCode" : "VISA",
      "issuerCodeExtension" : "issuerCode_Other_Value"
    },
    "Issuer" : {
      "value" : "Example String Value",
      "description" : "Visa",
      "name" : "Example String Value",
      "uRL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
      "id" : "codeExternal_1"
    },
    "CardHolderName" : "Example String Value",
    "CardNumber" : {
      "@type" : "CardNumber",
      "encryptionKey" : "KHC32198gt4",
      "encryptionKeyMethod" : "RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey",
      "encryptionMethod" : "Triple DES",
      "encryptedValue" : "5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc",
      "mask" : "xxxxxxxxxxxx9922",
      "token" : "AEGHV234AUD54367",
      "tokenProviderID" : "Shift4 (payment)",
      "authenticationMethod" : "SecurityCode",
      "PlainText" : "Example String Value",
      "Warning" : {
        "value" : "Example String Value",
        "language" : "en",

        "typeExtension" : "type_Other_Value",
        "shortText" : "Example String Value",

        "statusExtension" : "status_Other_Value"
      }
    },

      "@type" : "AuthenticationVerification",

      }
    },

      "@type" : "MagneticStripe",
      "encryptionKey" : "KHC32198gt4",
      "encryptionKeyMethod" : "RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey",

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Privacy
        Data use and sharing permissions.
        Details
        Type Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        CardCode
        Card code association such as VI for Visa, MC for Mastercard or AX for American Express, etc.
        Details
        Type CardAssociationCode
        Example Value AX
        Required false
        Pattern ([a-zA-Z]{2})?
        Max Occurrences 1
        CardType
        Example: BritishAirwaysVisaSignatureCard
        Details
        Type PaymentCardType_Issuer
        Example Value 786
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Issuer
        Example: Mastercard
        Details
        Type CodeExternal
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        CardHolderName
        Card holder name.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        CardNumber
        Credit card number embossed on the card.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:CardNumber
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        AuthenticationVerification
        Verification digits.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:AuthenticationVerification
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        MagneticStripe
        Magnetic stripe.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:MagneticStripe
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 3
        SeriesCode
        The 3 character CVV code or series code found on the back of the payment card.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:SeriesCode
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        id
        XML ID only for use within the document.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:ID
        Example Value paymentCard_1
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        effectiveDate
        Start month and year.
        Details
        Type DateMMYY
        Example Value 0116
        Required false
        Pattern (0[1-9]|1[0-2])[0-9][0-9]
        Max Occurrences 1
        expireDate
        End month and year.
        Details
        Type DateMMYY
        Example Value 0117
        Required false
        Pattern (0[1-9]|1[0-2])[0-9][0-9]
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        secureInd
        If true, all or a portion of this data is secure, via tokenization, encryption and/or masking.
